sections.title: MBBS Admission in Uttarakhand 2025-26, Colleges Seat Matrix, Fee Structure, Application process, cut-off and Counselling

content.content: Uttarakhand is a bustling center of industry, innovation, and education, celebrated for its vibrant culture, storied past, and significant economic contributions to India. Its capital.

Renowned as a premier destination for medical education in India, Uttarakhand offers a plethora of undergraduate and postgraduate medical programs, drawing students from all corners of the nation. Admission to MBBS programs in Uttarakhand is conducted through the NEET exam, with successful candidates participating in state counseling for enrollment.

The MBBS curriculum in Uttarakhand spans 5.5 years, comprising 4.5 years of academic study and 1 year of compulsory internship, providing students with comprehensive training and practical experience.In Uttarakhand aspiring MBBS students have a variety of options available for admission. The state boasts both government and private medical colleges and universities. Typically, securing admission into government medical colleges is more competitive than private ones, resulting in higher cut-off marks for government institutions.

The total number of MBBS seats in Uttarakhand can vary each year due to factors such as government policies, changes in infrastructure, and accreditation of new medical colleges. For MBBS Admission Uttarakhand 2025 total 1150 seats are available in Government and Private Medical Colleges in Uttarakhand. The state has 1 AIIMS College located in Rishikesh and 5 Government and 3 Private Medical Colleges.

In the following sections, we will delve into the specifics of MBBS admission for the academic year 2025-26 in Uttarakhand including details on college seat matrix, fee structure, application process, cut-off marks, and counseling procedures. For personalized assistance with MBBS admission in India or abroad, feel free to reach out to our dedicated admission counseling team at MBBS APP.

Uttarakhand has a total of 8 Medical Colleges, including 5 government medical colleges, 1 AIIMS (All India Institute of Medical Sciences) and 3 private medical colleges. The government medical colleges offer 700 MBBS seats, while the private medical colleges offer 450 MBBS seats.

content.table:
Application modeOnline
Admission CriteriaNational Entrance Exam
Entrance ExamNational Eligibility cum Entrance Test (NEET)
Examination AuthorityNational Testing Agency (NTA)
Total College Count8 (Including Govt & Private)
Number of SeatsMBBS- 1150 (Including Govt & Private)
Admission ProcessThe admission process will be conducted through online counselling by the State Common Entrance Test Cell – Uttarakhand.
+91 80946-06060
Rounds of State CounsellingThere will be Four Rounds of Counselling for the state quota seats. The first round of counselling will be held in July 2023, the second round in August 2023, and the Third & Fourth Round in September 2023.
Selection CriteriaCandidates will be selected based on their NEET-UG score and the reservation criteria.
Top MBBS CollegesAll India Institute of Medical Sciences Rishikesh, Soban Singh Jeena Government Institute of Medical Science & Research Almora, Gautam Buddha Chikitsa Mahavidyalaya Dehradum, Doon Medical College, Dehradun, Uttarakhand

content.content: The NEET cutoff is determined based on various factors such as the number of applicants, the difficulty level of the exam, and the availability of seats in medical and dental colleges. It varies for different categories like General, OBC, SC, ST, and others. Each state and college may also have its own cutoff scores. Generally, higher cutoffs are seen in prestigious colleges and for popular courses. It’s crucial for aspiring medical students to keep track of cutoff trends and prepare accordingly

sections.title: Application Form for Uttarakhand MBBS Admission 2025-26

content.list:
• The application form must be filled out entirely online. Only online application fees are accepted from students.
  • The MBBS Admission Uttarakhand Application Form is now available, and candidates can submit their applications till the deadline.
  • In order to register for the Uttarakhand MBBS 2025 application form, applicants must input their personal, academic, NEET 2025 score, and other information. The authority will announce the merit ranking and adhere to the procedure of document verification, choice-filling, and place-allocation.
  • Candidates must bring a hard copy of their admissions application along with all Original Documents when they report to the designated medical or dental college; otherwise, their application will be rejected/disqualified without further communication.

sections.title: Application Fees & Security Deposit for MBBS Admission Uttarakhand 2025-26

content.content: Application fees for NEET UG Counselling can be paid online through the official website of Directorate of Medical Education & Research Uttarakhand during the registration window for each counselling round. Category wise application fee for Uttarakhand NEET UG Counselling is as follows:

content.table:
Particularfee
Application Fee6,500/- (For Round I and Round II ) for all categories.(
bank charges will be borne by the candidates only)

content.content: Note- This fee can be paid online through the official website of Directorate of Medical Education & Research Uttarakhand during the registration window for each counselling round.

The security deposit in Uttarakhand NEET UG Counselling serves various purposes. It ensures a fair, effective, and financially sustainable process for a larger range of qualified applicants by discouraging seat blocking, encouraging commitment and thwarting fraud. This financial commitment benefits everyone in the long run by preserving an open and trustworthy system for medical college admissions. Details of Security deposit is as follows: -Application fees for NEET UG Counselling can be paid online through the official website of Directorate of Medical Education & Research Uttarakhand during the registration window for each counselling round. Category wise application fee for Uttarakhand NEET UG Counselling is as follows:

content.table:
ItemGovtPrivate
Security Money-10,000/-(5,000/- For SC/ST/OBC of Uttarakhand domicile only)1,00,000/- for all category

content.content: Note: – Please note that application fees and Security money can vary, and the details are usually provided in the official information bulletin or notification released by the relevant authorities. Make sure to refer to the latest official documents or contact the concerned authorities directly for the most accurate information.

sections.title: Application Process for MBBS Admission Uttarakhand

content.list:
• Copy of allotment letter.
  • Proof of payment of centralized advance tuition fee.
  • High School (10th) Certificate for Age proof.
  • Intermediate (10+2) Certificate.
  • Intermediate (10+2) Mark sheet.
  • NEET UG 2023 Admit Card (issued by N TA)
  • NEET UG 2023 Result/Rank letter (issued by NTA)
  • Certificate of Reserve category, if applicable.
  • Certificate of Sub Category, if applicable. (for Domicile/Permanent resident of Uttarakhand only)
  • PWD category certificate issued by the Special Medical Board constituted by the Director General Medical Health & Family welfare, Uttarakhand only, if applicable.
  • Certificates required for Ward of Kashmiri Migrants, if applicable. (please refer to Information bulletin)
  • Domicile Certificate ( For Uttarakhand candidate only)
  • Valid ID proof (preferably Aadhaar Card/Passport/ PAN card/driving license , etc)
  • Other document as per the requirement of the concerned college (kindly visit the college website or contact the concerned person)
  • Remaining amount Bank Demand Draft (tuition fee/hostel/mess charges etc as per the allotted college)

• The candidate must be an Indian National.
  • The candidate must be registered with State CET cell, Dehradun through online application on website of State CET Cell.
  • Indian Citizen
  • Overseas Citizen of India (OCI) Candidate will be eligible for Government / Corporation / Government Aided / Private unaided college for academic year 2025-26.
  • Those who want to apply must have a 10+2 in the science stream from a recognized board.
  • Those who want to apply for Uttarakhand MBBS Admission must have taken Biology as a required course and have a minimum of 50% overall marks.
  • Those who want to apply must take the NEET Exam. From the 2023–24 academic year on, there is no upper age limit to take the NEET exam.

sections.title: Document Required for MBBS Admission Uttarakhand

content.list:
• Score Sheet for NEET 2023
  • NEET Admission Ticket
  • Letter of Assignment
  • 12th class card and passing certificate
  • Grade Card and Passing Certificate for Grade 10
  • All grade reports for classes 11 and 12, if they were passed in more than one attempt.
  • A copy of a photo identification card, such as a driver’s licence, PAN card, electoral card, government or public utility card, school ID card, or Aadhar card.
  • Valid caste certificate, sub-category certificate, if applicable
  • Certificate of domicile, if applicable
  • 4 passport size photographs same as affixed on application form
  • Character certification from the previous study institution
  • Migration Certificate from the previous study institution
  • The MBBS admission process in Uttarakhand is a competitive one, but it is also a fair one. All candidates who meet the eligibility criteria have a chance to be admitted to a medical college in the state.
